cst8284.asgmt4.roomScheduler

Class RoomScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst8284.asgmt4.roomScheduler.RoomScheduler

  • public class RoomScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class RoomScheduler is used to implement functions for room booking system. Built up in assignment 1, add more functions in assignment 2 and assignment 3. Changed in assignment 4 to match Swing methods.
    Version:
    1.04
    Author:
    Ye Zhang

    • Method Detail

      • launch

        public void launch()
        Method launch is the beginning of the RoomScheduler, it loads CurrentRoomBookings.book if the file exists, calls RoomSchedulerDialog loadAndShowScheduler method.

      • saveRoomBooking

        protected static void saveRoomBooking(RoomBooking booking)
        Method saveRoomBooking save a new booking to the RoomBooking ArrayList, check the overlap, and sort the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        booking - a RoomBooking object

      • deleteBooking

        protected static boolean deleteBooking(RoomBooking booking)
        Method deleteBooking will remove a booking from ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        booking - a RoomBooking object
        Returns:
        return a String to the dialog shows the deletion result.

      • changeBooking

        protected static void changeBooking(RoomBooking booking,
                                    java.lang.String originalDate,
                                    java.lang.String newDate,
                                    java.lang.String newStartTime,
                                    java.lang.String newEndTime)
        Method changeBooking find the room booking information from the input date and time, check the overlap, change the ArrayList, and sort the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        booking - the RoomBooking object will be changed
        originalDate - the original date will be changed
        newDate - the new date will be changed to
        newStartTime - the new start time will be changed to
        newEndTime - the new end time will be changed to
        Throws:
        catch - BadRoomBookingException for input exception

      • displayBooking

        protected static RoomBooking displayBooking(java.lang.String date,
                                            java.lang.String startTime)
        Method displayBooking find and display the room booking information of input day and time.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to be searched
        startTime - the start time to be searched
        Returns:
        return the RoomBooking if exist of the input day and time

        Method displayDayBooking find and display the room booking information of the input day.
        Parameters:
        cal - a Calendar include the date information
        Returns:
        return a String to dialog to show the result

        Returns:

      • saveBookingsToFile

        protected static java.lang.String saveBookingsToFile()
        Method saveBookingsToFile save the ArrayList of RoomBooking to file CurrentRoomBookings.book.
        Returns:
        return a String to dialog to show the result
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - throw and catch File IO exception

      • loadBookingsFromFile

        protected static java.lang.String loadBookingsFromFile()
        Method loadBookingsFromFile load the ArrayList of RoomBooking from the file CurrentRoomBookings.book. Use EOFException to judge the file has been loaded successfully.
        Returns:
        return a String to dialog to show the result
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if CurrentRoomBookings.book is not exist

      • makeBookingFromUserInput

        protected static RoomBooking makeBookingFromUserInput(java.lang.String date,
                                                      java.lang.String startTime,
                                                      java.lang.String endTime,
                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                      java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                                      java.lang.String org,
                                                      java.lang.String category,
                                                      java.lang.String desc)
        Method makeBookingFromUserInput get the RoomBooking information from the add dialog, check the input correction, catch and print BadRoomBookingException.
        Parameters:
        date - the date of the booking
        startTime - the start time of the booking
        endTime - the end time of the booking
        name - the name of the booking
        phoneNumber - the phone number of the booking
        org - the organization of the booking
        category - the category of the booking
        desc - the description of the booking
        Returns:
        return a RoomBooking object created with user input

      • makeCalendarFromUserInput

        private static java.util.Calendar makeCalendarFromUserInput(java.lang.String date,
                                                            int time,
                                                            boolean startTime)
        Method makeCalendarFromUserInput prompt the user for the date and time of a booking, check the input correction.
        Parameters:
        date - input date from dialog
        time - input time from dialog
        startTime - if startTime is true, it's a start time. if startTime is false, it's a end time.
        Returns:
        return a Calendar as start time or end time

      • processTimeString

        protected static int processTimeString(java.lang.String t)
        Method processTimeString is responsible for taking the time String and returning an integer value, corresponding to the 24-hour format expected by the Calendar’s set() method. Check the input correction, catch and throw BadRoomBookingException.
        Parameters:
        t - a String that is input from user
        Returns:
        return the time of 24-hour format
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - throw exception with header of "Wrong time" if input is not start with a number, throw exception with header of "Bad time format" if input is not formatted correctly

      • findBooking

        private static RoomBooking findBooking(java.util.Calendar cal)
        Method findBooking with a parameter Calendar check 1 hour overlap exist or not. Return null if overlap is not exist, otherwise return the overlapped RoomBooking object.
        Parameters:
        cal - the Calendar parameter will be the start time
        Returns:
        return a RoomBooking in the ArrayList if there is a overlap, return null if there is no overlap

      • findBooking

        private static RoomBooking findBooking(RoomBooking booking)
        Method findBooking with a parameter RoomBooking check a time block overlap. Return null if overlap is not exist, otherwise return the overlapped RoomBooking object.
        Parameters:
        booking - the RoomBooking will be used to check the time block overlap
        Returns:
        a RoomBooking in the ArrayList if there is a overlap, return null if there is no overlap

      • getRoomBookings

        protected static java.util.ArrayList<RoomBooking> getRoomBookings()
        Method getRoomBookings access the private field roomBookings ArrayList and return it.
        Returns:
        return ArrayList of RoomBooking class

      • setRoom

        private void setRoom(Room room)
        Setter for room
        Parameters:
        room - a Room class parameter

      • getRoom

        private Room getRoom()
        Getter for room
        Returns:
        return the room of Room class

      • isGeneralInputCorrect

        protected static boolean isGeneralInputCorrect(java.lang.String input)
        Method isGeneralInputCorrect check the input is not null or "". Return true if the input is not null or "", otherwise return false and throw the BadRoomBookingException.
        Parameters:
        input - a String that is input from user
        Returns:
        true if the input is not null or ""
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - throw exception with header of "Null value entered" if the input is null, throw exception with header of "Missing value" if the input is only space or ""

      • isInputNameCorrect

        protected static boolean isInputNameCorrect(java.lang.String name)
        Method isInputNameCorrect check the input first name and last name both is less than or equal to 30 characters, and both of them only contains alphabetic characters, the dash (-), the period(.), and the apostrophe('). Return true if the input name is correct, otherwise return false and throw the BadRoomBookingException.
        Parameters:
        name - a String that is the name of contact, first name or last name
        Returns:
        true if the name is match the requirement
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - throw exception with header of "Name contains illegal characters" if the input name is not match the requirement, throw exception with header of "Name length exceeded" if the input name is exceed 30 characters

      • isInputPhoneNumberCorrect

        protected static boolean isInputPhoneNumberCorrect(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Method isInputPhoneNumberCorrect check the input phone number is formatted as 'xxx-xxx-xxxx' Return true if the input phone number is correct, otherwise return false and throw the BadRoomBookingException.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - a String that is a phone number
        Returns:
        return true is the input phone number is formatted as 'xxx-xxx-xxxx'
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - throw exception with header of "Bad telephone number" if the input phone number is not formatted as 'xxx-xxx-xxxx'

      • isInputDateCorrect

        protected static boolean isInputDateCorrect(java.lang.String input)
        Method isInputDateCorrect check the input date is valid when formatted as 'DDMMYYYY' Return true if the input date is correct, otherwise return false and throw the BadRoomBookingException.
        Parameters:
        input - a String that is a date
        Returns:
        return true if the input date is valid
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - throw exception with header of "Bad Calendar format" if the input date is not valid

      • isInputTimeDurationCorrect

        protected static boolean isInputTimeDurationCorrect(java.util.Calendar start,
                                                    java.util.Calendar end)
        Method isInputTimeDurationCorrect check the time block, start time should earlier than end time. Return true if the input time block is correct, otherwise return false and throw the BadRoomBookingException.
        Parameters:
        start - a Calendar that is a start time
        end - a Calendar that is a end time
        Returns:
        return true if end time is later than start time
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - throw exception with header of "End time precedes start time" if end time precede start time, throw exception with header of "Zero time room booking" if end time is equal to start time
